about_the_game:
So you want to support Brand New Whatever's next adventures and want to know this cannot possibly be the end for One Night in Kawami?

First, Titania thanks you wholeheartedly. Second of all, here's what you get by purchasing the Superfan Pack:

Digital Artbook (Content in English only)


Do you like homemade cookies? I can't give you that, but I can offer you a homemade PDF with 13 pages of interesting trivia, tidbits and curiosities about the humble beginnings of One Night In Kawami... and a glimpse into some of its possible futures.

An Overwhelming Sense of Gratitude


A reward in itself, I'll say. So, what are you waiting for?

Go into ONIK's Properties and find the Browse Local Files button - you'll know where to look.

So you want to support Brand New Whatever's next adventures and want to know this cannot possibly be the end for One Night in Kawami?

First, Titania thanks you wholeheartedly. Second of all, here's what you get by purchasing the Superfan Pack:

Digital Artbook (Content in English only)


Do you like homemade cookies? I can't give you that, but I can offer you a homemade PDF with 13 pages of interesting trivia, tidbits and curiosities about the humble beginnings of One Night In Kawami... and a glimpse into some of its possible futures.

An Overwhelming Sense of Gratitude


A reward in itself, I'll say. So, what are you waiting for?

Go into ONIK's Properties and find the Browse Local Files button - you'll know where to look.

short_description: So you say you're a Superfan? Well, I trust you. Here, have an artbook showing the humble beginnings of One Night in Kawami - and a glimpse of its possible futures.
